Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39810 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.35.0-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-39810 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.35.0-14. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package busybox is earlier than 1.35.0-14, affected by CVE-2023-39810
